text:
Boys ATT- You know bills have phone numbers. You pay the bills. Can you share with kids?
Boys Xfinity- Should I share YouTube showing how it works?. They promote this, not spying.
Therapist- What should I do to be sure that we get reimbursed? Do I do it or do you, and for who?Job Plans- Shared a thread yesterday. We agree it
would help. Not possible in the status quo.
Beth Check- It's here somewhere in the mess. I'll locate and move to BofA- Xmas gift/Bend trip
Alki- Went down pretty well, pointed out the obvious. Will pay for trash removal. Refund possible.
Spring Break- I think we wait till after Dr Brown to have a realistic discussion about the options.
Please let me know what I am missing or what you would change. This is probably 100k and a calendar year for the attorneys...hmmmmm....
Message 918 of 4024
Sorry... that was passive aggressive.
Please accept my apology. It’s counterproductive
Sent:02/01/2024 at 12:56 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 01:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Dr Brown
Message 919 of 4024
Agree it’s a big list.
Stepping back, we are in this situation based on actions you took so I do take issue with frustration based on fact that there are real downstream
impacts for actions I could not control.
I’ll need to circle back on how we can connect.
The tone below feels very confrontational which makes me wary of jumping on a call or engaging in any type of discussion.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 01:02 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 01:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication
Message 920 of 4024
I’m not being confrontational at all. And have accepted my part.
Please just choose the bullets you would like to discuss and let’s Teams
I will not be negative! It’s just piling up on us so I want to address hot items.
Sent:02/01/2024 at 01:05 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/01/2024 at 01:16 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication
